lines.text: [last lines]
What does B.G. stand for?
Paul.
Now, Mr. Jonskill, if you take back your scenery I can't open. If I can't open, no one will be paid. Now your only chance, all of you, is let me open.
It's not the money, Mr. Frost, it's the principle!
Aye, the principle!

[puzzled]
You... you don't want the money?
...and none of your outbursts of charm. I am through!
But Phyllis, please!
No money, no opening date, no system, not even... Chaos, chaos, chaos!
Now, honey, calm yourself.
You can find another star!
Now, Phyllis, you are going too far.
On the contrary, I haven't gone *far* enough!
Where did you meet him?
What? Oh, we... met at a party, last winter.
I understand he was in Egypt last winter.
Well... Well, Cairo is in Egypt, isn't it?
Oh yes. Been there a long time.
Well, that's where we met. On the pyramids.
On the pyramids?
I mean... near the pyramids, just a little to the left.

[puzzled]
Little... er, left?
And when I heard that this young woman had actually visited you here, during office hours, in the Easter room, well, quite frankly, Harold, I-I was flabbergasted. I don't want this to happen again.
No, eh, Yes, Mr. Bruno.
We have a staff outing once a year for that sort of thing.
Oh, Gentlemen, wait a minute, please! We-we open tomorrow! You said you'd give me time.
Your times up! And you've broken your word, as usual.
Oh, but, you don't understand, I've got the richest man in Edinburgh behind me...
It's too late! We're finished with all your lies and excuses.
What do you mean lies?
Its a question of a complete lack of ethics, Mr. Frost.
But you heard me phone Bruno, didn't you? I'm starring his girl! Isn't that ethics? Well, isn't it!

[Talking on the phone]
I've told you a hundred times, I do not want to speak to the bank! What do I have to do, tell you in Scotch!
Well, don't stand there! Call Scotland Yard!
Scotland Yard's in London.
Well, what's it doing in London? I want that guy arrested!
On what charges?
All of them! Impersonation! Forgery! Mayhem!

[Walks in the room]
Mr Frost, I'm...
No!
[Secretary quickly exits]
Fraud! Slander! Liable! Arson! Well, go on, get out of here!
[Charlie exits]
Oh, stabbed in the back!
